chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p q : list (Term A n)), reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> CombLinear Q q -> CombLinear Q p

```coq
intros Q p q Hr Hcanon Hcomb.
induction Hr.
- apply Hcomb.
- destruct (ltM_dec p q0) as [[Hlt|Hlt]|].
  + specialize (order_reduceplus _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ cs eqA_dec _ _ ltM_dec os Hcanon H Hlt) as [Hcomb'|Heq].
    * exact Hcomb'.
    * subst q0. exact Hcomb.
  + apply IHHr. apply canonical_reduceplus with (r:=q) in Hcanon; auto. now apply reducestar_trans with (y:=q).
  + subst q0. exact Hcomb.
Qed.
```

original: intros Q p q Hr Hcanon Hcomb. induction Hr. - apply Hcomb. - destruct (ltM_dec p q0) as [[Hlt|Hlt]|]. + specialize (order_reduceplus _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ cs eqA_dec _ _ ltM_dec os Hcanon H Hlt) as [Hcomb'|Heq]. * apply Hcomb'. * subst q0. apply Hcomb. + apply IHHr. apply canonical_reduceplus with (r:=q) in Hcanon; auto. now apply reducestar_trans with (y:=q). + subst q0. apply Hcomb.
